oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Emery Interview Ronnie McDowell - Excerpt
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is from Ralph Emery's (entertainer) interview of Ronnie McDowell (performer) for Nashville's WSM. Tape features an unidentified female voice. Recording is from May 25, 1981.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Ronnie McDowell
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ralph Emery and Ronnie McDowell discuss the Portland Depot and an unidentified voice comments off mic
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emery, Ralph; McDowell, Ronnie;
